articles.author: Amala Balakrishner
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets trade mixed as Trump softens tariff stance - CNBC
articles.description: Market watchers were also awaiting updates on developments on trade deal negotiations between the U.S. and countries in the region.
articles.content: Before any trade agreements are reached with India and Japan, "large U.S. companies will likely try to cut idiosyncratic deals with the White House, perpetuating the policy patchwork," holding back i… [+1312 chars]
